Dear John Doe,

A new API key has just been created for your application foo-app on The Things Network.

API Key ID: TEST

API Key Name: API Key Name

Rights:

  • RIGHT_APPLICATION_INFO
    view application information
  • RIGHT_APPLICATION_SETTINGS_BASIC
    edit basic application settings
  • RIGHT_APPLICATION_DEVICES_READ
    view devices in application

    read application traffic (uplink and downlink)

You can view and edit this API key in the Console.
